title: From Javelin Thrower to WPL Star: Kiran Navgire's Rise to the Top of the Order
content:
Kiran Navgire, the UP Warriorz's power-hitting sensation, has taken the Women's Premier League (WPL) by storm.  She is a late bloomer in cricket, having only switched from athletics in 2017. 

Navgire's athletic background as a javelin thrower and short-distance runner gives her the power and speed to dominate the game.  Her natural talent and dedication to the sport have helped her rise rapidly through the ranks, despite a late start.  

After a stunning debut in the WPL,  Navgire has cemented her position as a key player in the league, demonstrating her ability to bat aggressively and contribute crucial runs.  She's a force to be reckoned with, and her story is one of inspiration and perseverance.
author: Tanya Kini
